summary: Completed testing of Saqr App new features: TikTok-style Bottom Tab Bar, Change Password API, Profile Page menu items, Guest mode, and Navigation. All features working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working. TikTok-style nav bar shows cyan and red bars with play button. Profile page has all 6 menu items (withdraw, history, password, support, share, privacy). Change password API validates wrong password, same password, and weak password correctly.

bottom_tab_bar_tiktok_style.details: Bottom nav shows TikTok-style play button with cyan (#25f4ee) left bar, white center with play icon, and red (#fe2c55) right bar. data-testid='nav-watch-ads' found.

change_password_api.details: POST /api/auth/change-password - Returns 401 for wrong current password, 400 for same password, 400 for weak password, 401/403 for no auth

profile_page_menu_items.details: All menu items found with data-testid: menu-withdraw, menu-history, menu-password, menu-support, menu-share, menu-privacy, menu-logout

guest_mode.details: Guest mode button (data-testid='guest-mode-btn') works. Profile page shows 'Guest Mode' card with login prompt instead of menu items

navigation.details: Navigation works between home, profile, and advertiser pages. data-testid: nav-home, nav-profile, nav-advertiser all functional

change_password_dialog.details: Change password dialog opens from menu-password button. Shows 3 fields: current password, new password, confirm password
